name: Brighthearth Banneret
originalText:
Elemental spells and Warrior spells you play cost {1} less to play.
Reinforce 1—{1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

rulings.text: The effect reduces the total cost of the spell, regardless of whether you chose to pay additional or alternative costs. For example, if you cast a Rogue spell by paying its prowl cost, Frogtosser Banneret causes that spell to cost {1} less.
A spell you cast that’s both creature types costs {1} less to cast, not {2} less.
When you cast an Elemental spell by paying its evoke cost, this effect reduces the cost to cast that spell by {1}.
